awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 2 nominations.

fullplot: Five office friends meet up for a night on the town to celebrate the forthcoming marriage of one of them. As the night wears on and the drink starts to tell, they become more confidential in expressing their concerns and hopes.

title: The Bachelor Party
